data.message: Is St Ives in Cornwall on there? I don't want anything that involves flying. Perhaps an overnight sleeper from London.

replies.message: Hi there, unfortunately St Ives isn't included. There were thousands of dream holiday destinations we could have included and sadly it wasn’t possible to include every one, which is why we worked with travel experts to help us identify the top 75 locations. However, you could always choose London, Cardiff or Edinburgh if  you fancy a dream holiday here in GB. Thanks :)
